thread.section_title: Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Magnifique
thread.title_full: Magnifique - Review of Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Meredith v
title: Magnifique
text: Beautifully appointed from the moment you step through the front door...it is a little slice of French heaven. The staff were all friendly and very helpful. We stayed in the family suite and it was fantastic!!! So much space for our family of four for such an excellent price. The suite was beautifully appointed, warm and more than we could have ever hoped for in Paris. It is nice and close to both of the major train stations on this side of the city and within a block or two you'll find the metro stop, the hop on hop off bus stop, banks and lots of family friendly restaurants. A perfect base to explore an exciting city.
